name: CRUSADER (DEAD_PROCESS)
description:
Your town has been taking over by a cult!, stop them before is too late.

CRUSADER is a first person shooter inspired by DOOM, and tried to give it a retro look.

Controls: WASD to move RMB to shoot SPACE to jump Q to switch weapons The ammo you pick up is for your current weapon

If you like my work, consider buying me a pizza: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/deadprocess
